edu.tamu.cse.lenss.edgeKeeper.server

Class RequestServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.tamu.cse.lenss.edgeKeeper.server.RequestServer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Terminable, java.lang.Runnable

    public class RequestServer
extends java.lang.Object
implements Terminable
    This class is responsible for running a server to which the client applications communicate. It runs in a different thread. Each thread corresponding to Java and CPP servers.
    Author:
    sbhunia
